text: Brewster's Millions is a 1935 British musical comedy movie directed by Thornton Freeland and is the fourth adaption of the 1902 novel of the same name by George Barr McCutcheon and the 1906 play of the same name. It stars Jack Buchanan, Lili Damita, Sydney Fairbrother, Nancy O'Neil, Fred Emney, Allan Aynesworth, Laurence Hanray. ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 musical movies Category:1935 comedy movies Category:British musical movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Thornton Freeland Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies about inheritances
title: Brewster's Millions (1935 movie)
